Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory155.png'}
{3: 'Incessant chatter fills the transport aircraft. Conversations from the ATC channel burrow into your ears through your personal terminal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Mother Swan-6 to Babylonia Control. Now approaching route 3-3-4. New area up ahead. Request confirmation of route validity.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Babylonia Control to Mother Swan-6. Route 3-3-4 and airspace ahead are both clear. Drop cargo at point Papa-Sierra-14.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Copy. Drop cargo at point Papa-Sierra-14.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are we there?', 3: '15'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "Almost. This airspace isn't our usual AO, so we had to double-confirm.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "We're near KCC's backyard. Scuttlebutt is they got a few Thunderstorm emplacements back in the Golden Age up and running.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "Don't worry, though. Babylonia pre-screened our flight path. It'll be alright.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: "We're above the target area. Starting descent.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Mother Swan-6 to Babylonia Control. Reached point Papa-Sierra-14. Following protocol 01 for vertical landing.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Babylonia Control to Mother Swan-6. Copy. Relaying channel to Forsaken Stronghold Zulu-Tango-8.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "This is Zulu-Tango-8, independent Forsaken battle group. We'll guide you in.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'Please proceed along the 3D-marked path and make your landing at...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Babylonia is rebuilding a... theater?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'Yep. The Glazed Arch Theater. Basically takes up the entire coast.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "In the old days, you couldn't even come close to the doorstep without a Swiss bank account. The best Thespioids, with M.I.N.D.s copied from the real deal, played all the classics here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "Course. When the punishing happened, all them 'crats abandoned the place like it's the plague.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken', 3: "Now, all that's left around here are the servants.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Forsaken soldier gestures for you to look, but you can already guess what he means.'}
{3: 'Corrupted service mechanoids still walk the rows after all these years. Some are even carrying fruit platters and hot towels—now rotten and cold—with them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "A stage without an audience... Let's draw the curtains.", 4: '2'}
